channel.title: Help with a 317 winterlove
channel.description: hi im new to coding rsps and my friend is starting me out on a winterlove source so i was wondering if anyone has a guide for 317 source that i can use to help me start coding i dont need like voule command generator i just need a guide like where can i found quest tab so i can change the quests names so something else like "dragon slayer" and i want to change it to "@cya@ Owner Teh Genevoix" so basically i want a guide on how to code for beginners so thanks soo much :D

item.title: Help with a 317 winterlove
item.dc:creator: @teh_genevoix teh genevoix
item.description:
@teh_genevoix wrote:

okay how do i learn that just by reading the lines? and yeah ik i just said i was asking for rep to that one guy

Read full topic

item.title: Help with a 317 winterlove
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

I suggest learning the basics of Java first, as then you’ll have more understanding of creating Strings and variables used to display text on existing text (you will need the text line number, found in most interface lists).

The reason I – you, was because asking for rep and not even doing anything to deserve it just brings the point of reputation in the first place to pretty much nothing.

Read full topic

cause i asked for rep but i edited it so i removed it
